import React from "react"; import "./signin.css"; class SiginIn extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state ={ sel: '', spw: '' } } onEmailChange = (event) => { this.setState({sel:event.target.value}) } onPasswordChange = (event) => { this.setState({spw:event.target.value}) } onSubmitInfo = () => { fetch('https://localhost:3000/') this.props.onRouteChange('home') } render(){ return (
Sign In

If your are a new user

kindly register here ......!

); } } export default SiginIn;
